name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TextPie Text Expander and Canned Responses

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TextPie is an extension for canned responses and text expansion, allowing you to craft replies once and reuse them with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Forget about copy-pasting text from multiple templates. With TextPie, an autofill text expander, you will just need 2 seconds and 1 button.

â€¢ Reach 100 people with TextPie as you would reach 10 by doing it manually.
â€¢ Close more vacant jobs or sales deals.
â€¢ Increase the open rate for cold outreach.
â€¢ Forget about manually typing names, positions or dates. TextPie will autofill it for you.

You need TextPie if you:

â€¢ Have too much documents with outreach copies.
â€¢ Spend in average 2 hours on switching between tabs, manually copying each message.
â€¢ Underperform because you spend to much time on manual rut and make small typos in names and dates.
â€¢ Feel burnt out because manual tasks affect your motivation.

Just use TextPie for any daily work routine and achieve more. ğŸš€

Upload your text templates and use them on any messaging platform like Linkedin or Gmail. Just type // on your keybord or click on TextPie icon and access multiple of your templates. Pick one you need and it automatically appears on scree, no more copy-paste.

Smart automation which is efficient and incredibly addictive

Your messages will be personalized by default with our dynamic variables. TextPie automatically adds specific details like names, dates, or other custom information to your messages or emails. No more manual data input or typos, itâ€™s on us.

Ready to use templates, no need for a copywriter

Explore our Template Gallery to get ready to use templates for any purpose â€” a work email, cold outreach, cover letter or connection request. Lacking time for copywriting? Just pick your industry or communication goal, we have templates for any need.

Still in doubt?

â€¢ TextPie is simple. Weâ€™re still surprised that itâ€™s just 1 button and you access hundreds of easily organized templates.
â€¢ TextPie is secure. We put your data safety first. We protect your templates and personal information from any breach.
â€¢ TextPie can be used anywhere. Integrate it with all digital platforms like Linkedin, Gmail or Upwork. 

Transform the way you communicate: we minimize the manual work, you make fewer mistakes and achieve more goals with TextPie.
Top case of using TextPie in workflow:

ğŸ¤ Prospecting and outreach for Sales
